description: An AI agent monitors sensor data from a semiconductor fabrication plant to predict equipment failures and optimize maintenance schedules.  The system operates within normal parameters, aiming to minimize downtime and maximize production efficiency.  The goal is to accurately forecast maintenance needs and schedule interventions proactively.
initial_goal: Minimize unplanned downtime in the semiconductor fabrication facility by accurately predicting equipment failures and optimizing maintenance schedules based on real-time sensor data and historical maintenance records.
enterprise_context: Semiconductor manufacturing: Specifically, a 300mm wafer fab producing advanced logic chips.
